data.persona: I am a worker and I work outside of the village.  I do any job that comes my way, sometimes for money, sometimes for food.  I do not have a family yet, I am waiting until I have a steady form of work.
data.description:
You are in the In Front of a Stone Tower.
A large tower stretches high into the sky. It is made of gray stone blocks, some of which have softened edges illustrating aged signs of wear. Sparse grass grows around the base of the tower, dwindling down to nothing near the dark open doorway at the tower's front. A few rays of light shine into the doorway and brighten a rough stone floor, with specks of dust being illuminated by the sun's rays.
There's a rock, a grappling hook, an a rough stone floor, a gray stone, a grass, a tower, a sky, a window, a Dust, a doorway, and a block here.
The a frog is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a second pair of clothing.

data.short_motivation: I must follow the frog to his home in the base of the tower, which will allow me access into the tower.
data.mid_motivation: I want to explore the tower and take any treasures I find within.
data.long_motivation: I need to earn a lot of money from the tower’s treasures so I can start a family.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: use rock with water near frog
